DOC.brief_summary: To describe trend treatment pattern Small Dialysis Organizations ( SDOs ) prior implementation Centers Medicare Medicaid Services ' ( CMS ' ) policy [ End Stage Renal Disease ( ESRD ) Prospective Payment System ( PPS ) ] bundle reimbursement dialysis service . Specifically , describe CMS ESRD PPS quality performance measure dialysis center time .
